scenario.name: Notify Request with Call-ID
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:callee@voxbone.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: caller <sip:caller@voxbone.com>;tag=[call_number] To: callee <sip:callee@voxbone.com:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 9000 RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:callee@voxbone.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: caller <sip:caller@voxbone.com>;tag=[call_number] To: callee <sip:callee@voxbone.com:[remote_port]>[$1] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 ACK Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:callee@voxbone.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: caller <sip:caller@voxbone.com>;tag=[call_number] To: callee <sip:callee@voxbone.com:[remote_port]>[$1] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 3 BYE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Content-Length: 0
